name: TWIN THRUSTERS
description:
Welcome to TWIN THRUSTERS. Each player will command an engine and they'll need to communicate to control the ship. Find all the broken satellites and fix them!

If you are alone don't worry, this game can also be played by one single player.

CONTROLS:

LEFT PLAYER

[A - S]: Rotate Left Thruster

[W]: Activate Left Thruster

-------------------------------------------------

BOTH PLAYERS

[SPACEBAR]: Brake

[ESC]: Back to Main Menu

-------------------------------------------------

RIGHT PLAYER

[⇄]: Rotate Right Thruster

[↑]: Activate Right Thruster

CREDITS:
